TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CultureInfoConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

Docs.summary: Provides a type converter to convert <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> objects to and from various other representations.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This converter can only convert a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object to and from a string.
For more information about type converters, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
> [!NOTE] > You should never create an instance of the CultureInfoConverter class. Instead, call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A> method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> class. For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class.
## Examples The following code example converts a variable of type <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> to a string, and vice versa. First it constructs a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> variable using the Greek culture (represented by "el") and converts it to the string "Greek". Then it converts the string "Russian" to the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> representation "ru".
[!code-cs[Converters#8](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.componentmodel._35_1.cs)] [!code-vb[Converters#8](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.componentmodel._35_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[Converters#8](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.componentmodel._35_1.cpp)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool CanConvertFrom (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, Type sourceType);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool CanConvertFrom(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, class System.Type sourceType) cil managed

Docs.param: An that provides a format context.
A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type you wish to convert from.
Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object in the given source type to a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> using the specified context.
Docs.returns: if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks This converter can only convert a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object to and from a string.
The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. This can be `null`, so always check. Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.

The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. This can be `null`, so always check. Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.

Docs.exception: specifies a culture that is not valid.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter/StandardValuesCollection GetStandardValues(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: An that provides a format context.
Docs.summary: Gets a collection of standard values for a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object using the specified context.
Docs.returns: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> containing a standard set of valid values, or if the data type does not support a standard set of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. This can be `null`, so always check. Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool GetStandardValuesExclusive(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: An that provides a format context.
Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the list of standard values returned from <xref:System.ComponentModel.CultureInfoConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> is an exhaustive list.
Docs.returns: because the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> returned from <xref:System.ComponentModel.CultureInfoConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> is not an exhaustive list of possible values (that is, other values are possible). This method never returns .

remarks.format:
## Remarks The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. This can be `null`, so always check. Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
When the list is not exhaustive, then there are other valid values besides the list of standard values that <xref:System.ComponentModel.CultureInfoConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> provides.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool GetStandardValuesSupported(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: An that provides a format context.
Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this object supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list using the specified context.
Docs.returns: because <xref:System.ComponentModel.CultureInfoConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> should be called to find a common set of values the object supports. This method never returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. This can be `null`, so always check. Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
